TEXT.TITLE: RUSS TOGS INC <RTS> 4TH QTR JAN 31 NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 82 cts vs 76 cts Net 4,200,000 vs 3,954,000 Sales 58.7 mln vs 60.6 mln Year Oper shr 2.68 dlrs vs 2.47 dlrs Oper net 13.8 mln vs 13.0 mln Sales 274.3 mln vs 276.8 mln NOTE: Prior year net excludes loss 1,120,000 dlrs from discontinued operations and loss on disposal of 922,000 dlrs.
